original_title: Exclusive immigration counters for foreign travellers arriving at BIA
original_body_lines: The Controller General of Immigration and Emigration has confirmed that exclusive counters will be available for foreign travellers arriving at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) in Katunayake, from this evening (April 24).
This is being implemented as recommended by the Tourism Development Committee appointed by the President, according to the President’s Media Division.
